conversion_verification.notes: Second image shows an angled cutaway with extruded walls (height + thickness), visible floor plane, and readable interior volume; ceiling/roof is removed to expose rooms.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear wall height/thickness, good corner geometry, elevated/isometric view, and clean cutaway; minor simplification of some wall top edges/openings.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall room count and adjacencies match (open lounge/dining left with balcony, kitchen top-center, bath/WC core, two bedrooms right, separate garage). Minor proportion/partition differences around the laundry/robe/service core and some opening placements.

interior_elements.notes: Living/dining furniture, kitchen counters/appliances, beds, and bathroom fixtures are present and placed in correct rooms; scales/orientations are generally reasonable.

visual_clarity.notes: Walls/floors/openings are distinguishable and interior is well lit; slight ambiguity in a few door/window details due to simplified rendering.

detected_errors.description: Some door/window positions/sizes appear simplified or not perfectly matched to the 2D plan (especially around the central service areas).
Small layout/proportion drift in the kitchen/laundry/robe partitioning compared with the 2D plan, though overall adjacency remains correct.

summary: A true cutaway 3D model with strong overall layout fidelity to the 2D plan, with only minor-to-moderate simplifications in service-core partitions and some openings.
